#: Required by `font-inconsolata` cask in graphical profile for
macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode Command Line Tools 11.4. It appears
as though `/usr/bin/svn` still exists but there is no version of
Subversion provided by the command line tools which would be under
The Inconsolata font formula uses `svn` to download the font and
running the `/usr/bin/svn` program causes some internal infinite
looping. Installing Subversion which overrides the system version at
`/usr/local/bin/svn` makes this cask install properly. Chances are that
this is an upstream bug in either macOS Catalina 10.15.4 (the
`/usr` filesystem is readonly via SIP so the operating system provides
this) program, or a bug in Xcode Command Line Tools without a full
name: subversion
